experience: You and Qaisar both know Scott Kwait, Josh Huckabee, and 8 others
Qaisar can introduce you to 14 people at Confiz

I am providing my technical services to a very innovative startup Suitposh. I manage Suitposh's complete technology stack from development to server security and core computer vision features which involves extensive research and development.

As technical team lead I manage development and architectural designs for different products. Currently I am managing a technical team for 2 products named Salesdoor & Ilaaj.pk. Currently I am heading a team of 8 people where my responsibilities are to foresee any technical challenges, keep the current systems with updated tech and develop highly scalable and extendable solutions which involves complex full text search queries and Angular2 based portable components creation.

As a lead developer my role was to train junior resources, design the product flow and help create complex solutions.I was responsible for following the best practices and keeping a healthy codebase.Server setup, security and high availability were some of my core responsibilities.

At Confiz, I was leading the core development team of Pakwheels which is the largest automobile market place of Pakistan. My role was to plan, design and develop new solutions for Pakwheels, server performance optimisation ,front-end optimisation & have hands on experience in searching algorithms.I have worked in Agile & SCRUM project management environment and also have experience of migrating from Rails 3 to Rails 4.2.
University of Engineering and Technology, Lahore

I worked with kinaan for over a year. Kinaan exhibits the rare combination of being bright and having excellent software instincts with strong personal skills. Throughout this period coding was just a fun and meeting the client requirements and deadline was not a problem due to his leadership and technical skills. Kinaan is a great mentor who always enjoys to make other people learn new technologies and existing core concepts.Without exaggeration I never saw anybody like kinaan who is so dedicated to his work. He will never implement any thing less then perfect and always do his deep research to find the best answer.Kinaan has the unique skills to divide task among the team member and make them do it in best way without delaying the deadlines. He has a great sense of humour. Working with him has been a real occasion to learn and share.I would definitly want to work with him again and I strongly recommend him for any firm as team leader.

summary: I am a full stack Ruby on Rails architect with expertise in Angular2, having experience of more than 3 years. I have worked with some prestigious institutions during my career. Along with that, I try to help people at StackOverflow and contribute to open source community at Github because programming is something I am passionate about.I love to take challenges and learn new technologies and tools. Wether it's a new product to build from scratch or an ongoing project with complex features, I can jump into it and make it production ready with scalable architecture and fine-tuned performance sensitive solutions.I have also done extensive work on server performance optimisation, where at one instance I was able to reduce the backend response time to half. I have plans to write a book on ROR.My core skills involves  Web Development in Rails, Server security and maintenance , Databases , Angular 2, APIs & Web Services, Search Engine Optimisation, Full text search, New Relic, Google Analytics, TDD  and Rspec.I have BS-CS degree from University of Engineering & Technology Lahore. I graduated with honor degree from this institution and was one of the top student of my batch.I always welcome to hear from former colleagues, managers, or just interesting creative folk, so feel free to contact me if you got something to discuss.
name: Qaisar Nadeem
